comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
`new-object -ComObject` has been tested in [COM.Basic.Tests.ps1](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/test/powershell/engine/COM/COM.Basic.Tests.ps1). Maybe it makes sense to move these 2 tests to that file (in `basic com tests`) as well?

One more thing, the COM test should be skipped for nano server and IoT as well. Please see how it's done in COM.basic.Tests.ps1.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Moving the New-Object tests to the engine tests makes it hard to run all the new-object tests together.  We have this structure for a reason.  I think we should stick with it.
